website_summaries.verdict: A simple round table on the smaller side (32 inches) with a handy umbrella hole.
pros: Fits a small patio space, though it’s larger than a bistro table
Umbrella hole can be closed up with a plastic insert if unused
cons: Assembly may be problematic if wrong screws arrive with package, which has happened occasionally

customer_reviews.title: Love this table Fits perfectly on my balcony
customer_reviews.text: Love this table Fits perfectly on my balcony. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the table I added to my two new chairs. Color is matte black . Glass is nice and sturdy , not greenish in color like some it’s nice and clear . With a texture look to it. . I have an 18 inch umbrella base underneath with a 7 1/2 ft umbrella and it all works great ! You could use a 24 inch base if wanted for larger umbrella but not sure I do that look with a small table . This was definitely worth the money ! My husband put it together in about 15 minutes. Love it :)
customer_reviews.author: tracy lomagno

customer_reviews.title: Very well made patio table.
customer_reviews.text: These tables come unassembled, but very well packaged and with good instructions. It took my Grandson and I about an hour to put two of them together. They are very well made and very sturdy. The plastic insert for the umbrella pole is plastic and has a cap if no umbrella is used. 'Overall, I am very happy with them and would highly recommend them as an attractive addition to any patio, or in my case, balcony where space is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: John Park

customer_reviews.title: I love the table but since it is assempled upside I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the table but since it is assempled upside I didn't realize until it was uprighted that the legs had a lettered decal(identifying the parts for assembly instructions) right where they rest against the glass! Won't be easy to remove(I'm NOT taking the legs off to remove the label!) Hoping with dew/condensation they will loosen and I might be able to scrape them off with a toothpick
customer_reviews.author: lak318

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as I expected it to be. It was a little difficult to fit some of the legs into the slots by myself, but it really was an easy assembly. Just remember to take off the a b c stickers before final assembly.....I didn't and can see them through the glass. Haha It's a nice table.
customer_reviews.author: KSS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a small patio.
customer_reviews.text: It looks good. And it's the perfect size. The only cons were the part where the legs go in had moved, and I had to move them around to get the legs and properly. The 2nd issue was the tools they supplied were very flimsy and while you might be able to put it together with those tools it would take a very long time. I was able to do it in 10 minutes, with a drill and a wrench. I've included a Photo of the table and the one I had before. The old one just took up too much space was hard to walk around.
customer_reviews.author: Newmacgirl

customer_reviews.title: Plenty sturdy, good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice little table that fits well on the first stage of our expanding back deck. Package arrived in excellent condition. Feels plenty sturdy to put a quick dinner on. Not counting the time to get everything out of the boxes and bubble wrap, it took less than 10 minutes to assemble. Hint: don't tighten any of the nuts until all eight bolts are in and nuts are threaded just a couple of turns. Otherwise the legs would probably try to pop out of the slots on the underside of the tabletop. (Rocket science provided free of charge.) We like it and hope it holds up well. Probably have supper on it this evening.
customer_reviews.author: BamaRambler

customer_reviews.title: 32" round patio table.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased when I took this table out of its carton. BUT when I tried to assemble it the nuts did not fit the screws. There wasn't any way I could tighten them to make the table safe. I got out every wrench I had encluding the ones sent with the table. So it sits in my garage. I will not return it because of the weight etc of the table. Guess I will have to go to my local hardware store and see if they can get a fit for me Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lamaire

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The instructions that came with the table were incomplete and resulted in my having to spend 90 minutes or more, trying to figure it out. It would have been informative if the diagram had indicated that the position of the legs can be changed by simply pushing the female receptacles whichever direction they need to go in order to assemble the unit and get all of the screws lined up. Better yet would have been if this were described in text in the instructions. That being said, it is a very nice stable table.
customer_reviews.author: Carl S. Lau

customer_reviews.title: Fits small space, yet not as tiny as a bistro table.
customer_reviews.text: I searched all over for a smaller table for my little patio and then I found this. It is exactly what I needed, including the center hole for an umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Luka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together by myself. I recently purchased an umbrella and didn't consider how the base would look sitting between chairs. This small table covers the base nicely and makes my deck more functional. The table is well made and should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly, but nice looking
customer_reviews.text: It took awhile to put the legs on. The little plastic nubs under the glass tabletop where the legs are inserted are adjustable. Fresh out of the box they were not at a 90 degree angle, so we had to move them to make it fit. The screws are a bit too long, so the circular part doesn’t connect tightly, and the nuts are thinner at one end rather than allowing the screw to go all the way through, so the table seems a bit wobbly as a result. It does look nice for the price, however.
customer_reviews.author: Flamingo Starr

customer_reviews.title: Nice table and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Nice table for the price. Arrived in good condition and was easy to put together. Perfect size for my small patio area.
customer_reviews.author: Angie in SC

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, easy to assemble, and it looks great on my back patio. We liked it so much we bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT M HUNTER

customer_reviews.title: nice patio or deck table for a good price
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived in good shape due to excellent packaging. All parts and tools required for assembly were on hand and easy to find. A very simple instruction book was also included Assembly can be done by one person but I would recommend two people Once assembled the table is very sturdy and looks great .
customer_reviews.author: Rob n Hoode

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, wrong screws given
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table because I needed something quickly and the reviews overall seemed positive. It's pretty cheaply made and the inside of the legs were already rusting when I took it out of the box (it's powder coated on the outside only). The screws that arrived in my package were too long for the bolts also supplied - they don't even match the picture of the screws in the supplied instructions. I considered buying the right screws but even then I don't think this table would last very long anyway. I hate having to return such a large but this definitely has to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect for a small patio and the assembly was very easy!
customer_reviews.author: Haley LaPlant

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, though one of it's legs was bent
customer_reviews.text: Nice table, though one of it's legs was bent, A lot smaller than expected and no way would I ever put a 2" umbrella through it, it would blow over. Makes a nice accessory table for the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Bluesmoke

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, easy to clean outdoor table.
customer_reviews.text: This table was just what we wanted for our patio. We didn’t like our old square, metal table. This one matches a smaller one we have on our porch. It’s easy to wipe off, it’s sturdy, and will hopefully be rust resistant, like they promise. We’re very pleased! Oh, it’s a perfect height, too.
customer_reviews.author: B. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my patio
customer_reviews.text: I love my 32-inch, round, tempered glass table, which I christened just the other day with a pizza. It’s a lovely design, very sturdy, and I’m glad that it has a center hole for an umbrella, because I learned it’s really hot sitting on my patio, and now I need to buy an umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Fairfax

customer_reviews.title: Warning; if you like your hands and carpet glass free; don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this 0 stars. When I opened the box about a million glass pieces poured out all over my carpet. My hand has been cut into shreds. This is after I tried to get in contact with the sellers multiple times about changing shipping; the only replied afterwards requesting me to pay them for the change of address. Would have been easily solved if they hadn’t waited so long.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Defective!
customer_reviews.text: The placement of the fixtures on the bottom of the tabletop where the legs are inserted were way off. Whereas they should each have been the same distance from each other so that the legs were symmetrical and the 2 rings could be attached, two were off by *several inches*. So bizarre. Now I have to repack this beast and take it to a UPS Store. Not at all pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size and good quality
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a small table that’s enough for two people, or for one person using it for outdoor either for coffee, computer, reading etc. just the perfect size in the space that we have.
customer_reviews.author: Bina Qi

customer_reviews.title: Great looking table at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table to use in backyard with an umbrella. Works and look great. Would suggest to add some weight to the base if in a high wind area. Nice quality and priced table.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: If your lookin for a small table I recomend it
customer_reviews.text: Very happy well made table Will not hold an umbrella on its own in any kind of wind though But we have a pie mounted in our pool deck that holds the umbrella by itself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble, stable, and perfect for my small patio. I purchased a small umbrella, that provides needed shade for these very hot sunny days. The table added another area for people to sit outside and have hotdogs and hamburgers on the 4th of July. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Terry G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This table fit the space perfectly and the umbrella I ordered gave the finishing touch to my morning coffee.
customer_reviews.author: B Anna Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: Not tall enough I thought pub table accommodates bar chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It fits nicely on our deck and heavy enough to not blow away. We also have use our umbrella with it. Enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Patio Table
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, easy assembly, just what I wanted but, I haven't really been able to enjoy it because of all the rain down here in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Solid table, but the legs of the table we ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid table, but the legs of the table we got were completely broken. Our handy man setting it up made it work so it wasn’t a big deal, but it was annoying
customer_reviews.author: Ryan suydam

customer_reviews.title: Cool little table
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sturdy table. It was delivered pretty quick. Easier to put together if you have a second person to help, but overall I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Lestat

customer_reviews.title: Strong and looks Nice
customer_reviews.text: The table is just as described. Easy to put together and very nice. Would purchase again if we needed two.
customer_reviews.author: sue shopper

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. Even though I measured I was worried it would be a little large for the space but it is perfect. Looks great
customer_reviews.author: terry d colombo

customer_reviews.title: Really like
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and I feel sure it is enough to last for years to come. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: phyllis p singletary

customer_reviews.title: Tangkula outdoor patio
customer_reviews.text: I love my patio table it is beautiful and looks Great on my patio I was almost thinking of keeping in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: barbara d

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TABLE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS TABLE JUST THE RIGHT SIZE FOR MY DECK JUST AS ADVERTIZED SO GLAD I PURCHASED IT
customer_reviews.author: RT-me

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This table is the perfect large bistro size. It is sturdy, looks great on my patio, wears well, and was easy to assemble. Fantastic table for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Esse K

customer_reviews.title: It works for the space I have for it.
customer_reviews.text: It is the right size for my front dek. And looks good .I have a umbrella in the center.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, went together easy, and seems fairly sturdy. For the price I have no complainants.
customer_reviews.author: William Zermeno

customer_reviews.title: Nice table.
customer_reviews.text: Table seems like it is sturdy enough. The table is small. But big enough for four chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a solid table
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble. It fits perfectly on our upper deck.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Vos

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasant table that I have had for over two years on my deck
customer_reviews.text: The table is well built and sturdy. Perfect for my deck and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: RH SF

customer_reviews.title: Just as Pictured
customer_reviews.text: Excellent replacement for one destroyed in windstorm at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Lanie T

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: It is the right size for where I wanted it and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: ronnied

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product, sturdy and cleans out easily with the rain, looks good on the deck
customer_reviews.author: Snigdha

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly and not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The table was easy to assemble and it looks nice, but the table is not sturdy and it’s wobbly assembled on even surface. The legs are not adjustable for me to fix it, so it forces me to put something under one leg to even it out, which makes it look tacky and cheap. My inquiry about the solution to the seller is pending.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Z.

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: its an adorable little table. its good for only 2 chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Gina M. Estremo

customer_reviews.title: I love this table!
customer_reviews.text: This table is exactly as described. I bought three to stabilize my umbrellas. They were easy to assemble and have come in handy for small gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: A. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Mother’s Day present and set it up at her house the day of! Very easy to assemble, sturdy, and nice-looking! My mom loves it and now all we have to do is get an umbrella for it!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Cordova

customer_reviews.title: It was difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: No good directions for assembly, table is very sturdy after being assembled
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Rosser

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: The table is very sturdy and perfect in size for our sunroom.
customer_reviews.author: Maude Kovarik

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Very good price and easy to put together. Looks great in my garden.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Legs not even
customer_reviews.text: The table is the perfect size for our deck. It was easy to assemble but the legs are not even. It does not sit flat on the deck. I plan to work on readjusting the legs so it does not wobble.
customer_reviews.author: KazooDan

customer_reviews.title: It's a decent table
customer_reviews.text: I dislike about this product it easily tips over when I have the umbrella up and the wind blows
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Pietrzyk

customer_reviews.title: Tangkula 32 Outdoor Patio Table round Steel Frame Tempered Glass Top
customer_reviews.text: Legs are small in diameter and very light and that affects sturdiness. Assembly would have been easier if there was a written instructions and important notes rather than just diagrams with letters.
customer_reviews.author: IMELDA F.

customer_reviews.title: Outdooe Patio table.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I ordered and just the size I neede. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Table
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult to put together. We needed two people. But once it was assembled, it is a wonderful, sturdy table.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks nice. It even survived my daughter’s party

customer_reviews.title: Love the table
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived in good condition. It was easy for me to put together. It looks great and I love it. Definitely worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, except I had to separately buy an insert and plug for hole.
customer_reviews.author: lg66

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great little table for the money. Easy to assemble but was short 1 washer. Need to use your own pliers to save time. Looks great on my deck !
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small table to put between two patio chairs that could accommodate an umbrella. I love it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, easy to clean. maintenance free. Perfect patio table.

customer_reviews.title: it's real glass!

customer_reviews.title: My 91 year old mom could have gotten cut it did not say fragile !!

customer_reviews.text: This table was just what I needed for a small space! Thanks!

customer_reviews.text: quick delivery. exactly as prescribed. easy to assemble. perfect for pool deck. umbrella looks great with table.

customer_reviews.title: Great Patio Table!
customer_reviews.text: This is the replacement table that I received. Thank you so much for the replacement so quickly due to the top being shattered upon delievery. I absolutely love my little patio table!

customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for our deck with 2 or 4 chairs! Glass top is easy on the arms and elbows not like the wire mesh style! ; )

product_meta.title: Tangkula 32" Outdoor Patio Table Round Steel Frame Tempered Glass Top Commercial Party Event Furniture Conversation Coffee Table for Backyard Lawn Balcony Pool with Umbrella Hole
product_meta.description:
Description
Our brand Tangkula black Steel Round Table is perfect for your outdoor space. The color is neutral to complement most existing furniture. Contemporary design is exactly the right combination for your Patio or Garden spot. Sit down and enjoy a cup of coffee or have a pleasant meal outside. With it, you will enjoy your happy time. Don’t hesitate, come to buy it!

Feature 
Brand new and high quality
High temperature tolerant, UV resistant and waterproof
Tempered glass table
Top with a hole and 2 fixed collars, can erect great canvas umbrellas to shield you from sun or rain
Stylish design and neutral color fit with your backyard decor
Wipe-clean surface, and water waver glass table top, easy to clean
Easy assemble required

Specification 
Material: iron + 5mm tempered glass
Overall dimensions: 32" W x 28.5"H
Diameter of umbrella hole:2.0"
Product weight: 25.3lbs
Package include: 1 x round patio table
feature_bullets: 【Attractive Patio Table】 This modern patio table is designed with stylish modern style along with steel covered edge that adds an attractive looking and feeling, enhances the looking of any outdoor places. Also the well-made steel covers the glass closely and regularly that presents beautiful and enjoyable vision experience.

【All Weather Resistant】High temperature cannot beat it and its wide application for outdoor use fulfills your purpose to decorate your patio place. Our round patio table is durable enough to withstand rain, sun and wind for long-lasting lifespan.

【Enhanced Sturdy & Stable Construction】Constructed by sturdy yet lightweight premium steel frame, tempered glass and high quality hardware, which provide an ultra firm construction that prevents from wobbling or shaking, the rustproof frame also can go through the test of time, it's a superior enjoyment presented.

【Perfect Umbrella Installation】The center hole can perfectly accommodate your patio umbrella which takes you into a relaxing holiday time, protects you from sun, rain or wind. Rear leg design also guarantees the table steady preventing it leaning or inclining. Four separate legs bring you a reliable using experience for its stability.

【Moment to Clean】Its smooth surface makes it more easier to clean. The stains left on the table can be quickly wiped, which also reduces your annoyance accordingly. Water wave design not only offers a neat and clean presentation, but also ensures you a safe use even when the glass accidently breaks into pieces.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars260 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
